Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Complete PHASE 3: Simplify framework cards + create Week 1 coordination documents

PHASE 3 IMPLEMENTATION:
- Removed 50+ word stream descriptions from all 4 framework streams
- Kept framework tag names only (3-4 tags per stream, 1-3 words each)
- Removed "Core Frameworks" and "Key Benefits" sections
- Streams now display as minimal tags, not detailed explanations
- Framework references become hints, not lessons (aligns with simplified, community-first messaging)

COORDINATION DOCUMENTS CREATED:
- CALENDAR_INVITES_TO_SEND.md: Calendar invite templates for Monday kickoff + daily standups
- CLIENT_OUTREACH_STRATEGY.md: Complete guide for identifying and recruiting 3-4 clients for deep story interviews

FRAMEWORK CHANGES:
Inner Wisdom Stream: "Gene Keys, IFS, Shadow Work" (down from 45 words)
Embodied Presence Stream: "Somatics, Mindfulness, Breathwork" (down from 36 words)
Conscious Relating Stream: "Enneagram, Attachment Theory, Relational Intelligence" (down from 41 words)
Systemic Impact Stream: "Systems Thinking, Integral Leadership, Collective Transformation" (down from 42 words)

WHY:
- Lead with stories, not methodology
- Frameworks become secondary references, not primary content
- Visitors see community + transformation first, frameworks never (unless they dig)
- Supports AA-model positioning (belonging-first, not performance-first)

NEXT IMMEDIATE ACTIONS:
1. Send calendar invites (Monday 9 AM kickoff + Tue-Fri daily standups)
2. Identify 3-4 client candidates (Shalini & Jatin)
3. Begin outreach to clients (Week 2)
4. Collect coach origin stories (Shalini & Jatin)

STATUS: PHASE 3 Complete | PHASE 4 Pending (waiting for coach stories) | PHASE 5 Pending (Week 2)

EOF
)")
